adHeader: NEED HELP WITH YOUR HOME KLINNING ?
adDetails: NEEDS HELP WITH YOUR HOUSE CLEANING ? Try our services today. We have over 20 years of experience working in homes right here in the bay area! With plenty of references in any city, we are sure you will be satisfied with the way your home looks and feels after our cleaning crew attends to your home. Our prices are fair and we offer packages affordable for any household. We offer: * Weekly Services * Bi-weekly Services * Monthly Services * On Call Services * Special Projects (such as before parties, Graduations, Move-ins, Moving out) * Maid Service * Window Cleaning * Carpet and Upholstery Cleaning / BEST PRICES IN THE BAY AREA! We can offer crews ranging from 1 cleaner (personal service) to 3 cleaners for (large and fast cleaning jobs) 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!!! We mean it, if you are unsatisfied with our work, we will come back and make sure you are satisfied! For your convenience, we also provide SAME DAY SERVICE / Call in by 12pm and have your home clean by that afternoon! *******************SPECIAL NEW CUSTOMERS ************* 1. 2Bedrooms 1Bathrooms or up to 900 sq/ft for $45, special 2. House of 3Bedrooms 2Bathrooms or up to 1,100 sq/ft for $60, special 3. Moving Out Special, 2 House Cleaners x 1Hr for $65 w/products and services CALL TODAY !
